title: Make gift pack tiles clickable to open detail page

requirements.text: Add click navigation to GiftPackCard component so that clicking anywhere on the card navigates to a detail page for that gift pack

quotes: tiles on gift pack page should be clickable and opens a detail page

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking on any part of the GiftPackCard navigates to the detail page
The add-to-cart button remains functional without triggering navigation
Image carousel navigation controls do not trigger page navigation

requirements.text: Create a new gift pack detail page route that displays comprehensive information about a single gift pack including all images, full description, pricing details, and add-to-cart functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Detail page is accessible via a route with the gift pack ID as a parameter
Page displays the gift pack's title, full description, price, discount, and category
All images from the gift pack are displayed in a carousel or gallery
Page includes an add-to-cart button that functions correctly
Page shows loading state while fetching gift pack data
Page shows appropriate error state if gift pack is not found

requirements.text: Register the new detail page route in the router configuration with the pattern '/gift-pack/:id' where :id is the gift pack identifier
acceptanceCriteria: Route is added to the router configuration in App.tsx
Route correctly extracts the gift pack ID from the URL parameter
Navigation to the route works from the GiftPackCard component

constraints: Do not modify the existing GiftPackCard add-to-cart button functionality
Preserve the image carousel navigation controls in GiftPackCard without triggering page navigation
Use the existing useGiftPacks hook to fetch individual gift pack data by ID
nonGoals: Modifying the backend data structure for gift packs
Adding reviews or ratings to the detail page
